alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Northern Grafton; Southern Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 7:16PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...An area of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Grafton and northwestern Belknap Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 716 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Groton, or near Plymouth, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Plymouth, Canaan, Holderness, Ashland, Groton, Center Harber, Hebron, Dorchester, Ellsworth, Rumney, Orange, Campton, Thornton, Wentworth and New Hampton. This includes Interstate 93 between mile markers 73 and 91. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
